android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<!-- common --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CALL_PHONE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" /> <!-- bank --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.webkit.permission.PLUGIN" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="com.tencent.mtt.extension.Player" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <!-- download --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.DOWNLOAD_WITHOUT_NOTIFICATION" />
<uses-permission android:name="org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SMARTCARD" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.NFC" /> <uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.nfc.hce"/>
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" android:targetSdkVersion="22" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" >
<!-- YYHSDK 开始 --> <activity android:name="com.appchina.usersdk.YYHSplashActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name="com.appchina.usersdk.YYHLoginDialogActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:theme="@style/YYHDialogThemeHigh" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name="com.appchina.usersdk.YYHLoginActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:theme="@style/YYHDialogThemeDialog" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name="com.appchina.usersdk.YYHAccountCenter" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name="com.appchina.usersdk.YYHWebviewActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:exported="false" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.PayHubActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.MiniPayHubActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.PayListActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.ChargeActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.ServiceCenterActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.SelectCardAmountActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.SelectAmountActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.iapppay.pay.mobile.ui.activity.PcPayActivity" android:configChanges="screenSize|orientation|keyboard|navigation|layoutDirection" > </activity> <service android:name="com.iapppay.mpay.downmgr.DownLoadService" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" > </service>
<activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.app.H5PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.auth.AuthActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.umpay.quickpay.UmpayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboard|keyboardHidden" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/ump_translucent" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustResize" />
<activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.activity.PayMethodActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="portrait"> </activity>
<activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.inner_plugin.wechat_plugin.activity.WeChatNotifyActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize"> </activity>
<activity android:name="com.unionpay.uppay.PayActivity" android:label="@string/app_name" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" > </activity>
<service android:name="com.UCMobile.PayPlugin.PayPluginService" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.webkit.PLUGIN" /> </intent-filter>
<meta-data android:name="type" android:value="native" /> </service> <!-- YYHSDK 结束 -->
</application> </manifest>
